title: Birmingham City's Powerhouse stadium plans revealed
description: Club chairman Tom Wagner reveals the design for his club's new 62,000-capacity stadium in Bordesley Green.
content:
Plans for Birmingham's Powerhouse Stadium revealed
1 hour ago
Caroline GallWest Midlands
Birmingham City has unveiled its new 62,000-capacity stadium, the centrepiece of a multi-billion pound redevelopment in the city.
